attributes.action: Want the recognition of Hypermobility Syndrome
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want more recognition and less ignorance of this condition as it does exist and we want the right treatment in place, a better understanding from the medical profession and social services to recognise the amount of psychological distress that is caused, better funding as well

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Want the recognition of Hypermobility Syndrome."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15304.asp

Prime Minister's Office
